data.md:MetaData: exposed buried peat in alas sediments, Physiography: yedoma and alas relief, Vegetation: open Larix dahurica forest, Formation: boreal forest, Location: Alas Exposure Kolyma lowland, Duvanny Yar is a ca. 9 km long exposure along the Kolyma River, Kolyma lowland.
Late Quaternary vegetation and climate of Siberia and the Russian far east (Palynological and Radiocarbon Database)
